title: Service disruption on East West Line

title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Timur Barat

updates.text: [EWL] Free bus services #TanahMerah and #Tampines have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services on EW line between #TanahMerah and #Tampines are now running normally. Free bus services are still available.
[EWL] CLEARED: East Bound Train services from #TanahMerah towards #PasirRis are now running normally.
[EWL] No train service between #Tampines and #TanahMerah due to a track fault. Our engineers are at site rectifying the fault now.
[EWL] No train serive between #Tampines and #TanahMerah due to a track fault. Our engineers are at site rectifying the fault now.
